sub_title: Freelance competition economist and strategic consultant
summary:
I am a freelance economic consultant, specialised in competition economics, state aid, and economic or strategic market analysis.

As an experienced (competition) economist, I advise public and private bodies in state aid and regulatory cases as well as (competition) lawyers and their clients in cartel or other competition cases. 

Special expertise: (Cartel) Damage quantification • State aid • Market Economy Operator Test • Competition economics • Public sector strategy • Market regulation • Regulatory compliance • Economic market analysis

Strategy and Policy Advisor at Autoriteit Financiële Markten

profile_positions.description:
With my own company, I am working as freelance consultant. I have many years of experience working for top-tier economic consultancies in London and for PwC in Amsterdam, and I offer high quality economic and strategic consulting services. 

Website: https://aili-consulting.com
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
CEG applies expertise in economics and finance to address competition, regulation, disputes and transaction issues. We bring together senior professionals with experience in industry, consultancy and academia and the leading competition and regulatory agencies, to offer insightful and dependable advice. As freelance Senior consultant, I bring in my expertise in economic analysis needed to resolve State aid issues.

Website: www.ceg-global.com
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As Manager in the Strategy & Economics team at PwC, I specialise in economic market analysis and strategic advice to private companies and public bodies. I have applied these skills by managing large and complex projects for clients in the Netherlands and on international projects. 

Projects included, amongst others, the following:
-      Advice to the Irish Department of Communications, Energy and Natural Resources on the compliance of their National Broadband Plan strategy with the European State aid framework
-	I led a strategic portfolio review of all activities of a leading company in the Dutch waste-to-energy market, managing analysis conducted by the company’s employees. The aim was to identify which activities to invest in, hold or divest. Initial outcomes were presented to and discussed with the executive team and findings are now being implemented; 
-	I assisted the management of a large waste-to-energy company in the Netherlands with an economic market analysis assessing opportunities for new business at home and in four other European markets. The analysis was conducted by international teams of PwC as well as the client, I managed the analysis and presented results to the executive team as well as the company’s shareholders. The identified opportunities are now actively being pursued; 
-	Next to these strategic projects, I led economic analysis on state aid and competitive pricing and advised (semi-)public bodies on strategies that are compliant with competition law. 

The projects I managed got excellent client feedback and high client satisfaction scores. Within the PwC network, I am known as an expert on international waste markets and state aid in public private partnerships and am consulted frequently to help existing and new clients.
profile_positions.title: Manager Strategy & Economics

Economist

profile_positions.description: Next to studying full-time at Maastricht University, I was working as a private tutor in economics, statistic and mathematics for about 2 days a week. I helped Bachelor students understand the subject matter and pass their courses and I organised my tutorials independently, with students being introduced to me by my network.
profile_positions.title: Private tutor in economics, statistics and mathematics

profile_positions.description: During my three-month summer holiday from university, I did an internship in a German regional bank in Cologne to get an insight into banking and financial markets.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: While I was at grammar school in Germany, I started working as a freelance journalist for a German regional newspaper in the weekends. I specialised in equestrian sports and delivered weekly articles on regional competitions and events as well as special features for the trans-regional part of the newspaper on general equestrian topics.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Journalist
